title: ISldWorks.CommandInProgress
description: Improves performance of out-of-process applications by informing SOLIDWORKS that a sequence of API calls will be made by the out-of-process application.
returns: Set to True before calling the sequence of API calls, then set to false after calling the sequence of API calls
remarks:
SOLIDWORKS then reduces the number of updates it makes during these calls.
Use of this property only effects out-of-process applications.
